summary: MY 2002 OLDSMOBILE SILHOUETTE MINIVAN, AUTOMATIC SLIDING DOOR CLOSED ON ITS OWN AND CRUSHED ME.  THE DOOR WOULD NOT RELEASE.  I WAS ABLE TO PUSH THE SIDE BUTTON AFTER ABOUT 20 SEC.  I WAS INJURED.  I WAS BLOWN OFF BY THE DEALERSHIP.  IT HAS HAPPENED SEVERAL TIMES OVER THE PAST YEAR.  I AM NOW ANGRY BECAUSE IT HAS BEEN HAPPENING THIS WEEK.  IRONIC THAT AS I LEAVE FOR PHYSICAL THERAPY, THE THING THAT DAMAGED ME IS STILL MALFUNCTIONING.   *NLM
